attributes.action: Reduce University international  student tuition fees £17000 to £7000.
attributes.additional_details: Government should take action to those university who charges this year  international student  the same fee but didn't give anything.
attributes.background: As the condition getting more worst in uk everything going online in this case university should give some payback to international student who pays almost 2 tomes more than uk resident . University should take care of international student as well they should think by themselves .

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Require universities to partially refund tuition fees for 20/21 due to Covid-19
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/324762

Require Universities to partially refund tuition fees for 19/20 due to Covid-19
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/550738

Lower university tuition fees for students until online teaching ends
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/552911
